column4: anyone recommened a good gnutella client like frostwire that doesnt use java? i have limited memory available and frostwire kills it
gaim is much easier off the livecd though
so anyway... im installing ubuntu on a laptop and i have to problems. first, the wifi works perfectly, but it requires me to run dhclient for the device everytime i boot up or enable the wifi device
what chipset does the card have?
ralink chipsets do that if your using nework-manager-gnome in feisty
